alternatives.alternative: The AutoSum formulas refer to the column to the left of their cells.
The AutoSum formulas exclude the bottom row of data.

The AutoSum formulas include their own cells, creating a circular reference.

Q127. Which situation will result in a #REF! error?

alternatives.alternative: The cell referenced in the error message has been deleted
A nonnumeric agument is used in a function when a numeric value is expected
A required operator is omitted in a formula
The formula contains an undefined range

questions.question: Q128. Which feature allows formatting to be automatically added to new columns and rows?
Q129. What Excel feature can you use to automatically format cells that are greater than a specified value with designated fill and text colors?
Q130. Which formula could not have been entered in cell C5?
Q131. The last two digits of the Representative ID Number is the Office ID. Which function, when entered into cell B2 and then dragged to cell B6, returns the Office ID for each representative?
Q132. What is the fastest way to see the data in column E

alternatives.alternative: Double-click between column headers E and F
Double-click between column headers F and G
On the Home tab of the ribbon, select Fit to Column

questions.question: Q133. Excel's default view contains the Quick Access Toolbar and the ribbon. Which can you customize?

alternatives.alternative: both the Quick Access Toolbar and the ribbon

questions.question: Q134. Other than pasting an image, how can you insert an image file from your computer into a worksheet?

alternatives.alternative: On the Insert tab, click Pictures > This Device (Windows) or Pictures > Picture from file (Mac)
On the Insert tab, click SmartArt > Copy Image from Device (Windows) or SmartArt > Copy (Mac)
On the Insert tab, click Illustrations > Insert Illustration from This Device
On the Insert tab, click Icons > Insert > Picture from This Device

questions.question: Q135. You want to restrict a user from entering any amount greater than $100 or less than $20 in a row. Which Excel feature would you use?

alternatives.alternative: There is not a feature in Excel that will do this.

questions.question: Q136. What is the output of the formula =(8+2*3)/2?
Q137. How many columns in Excel sheet by default ?
Q138. What feature can you use to populate B2:B7 with the number from each sectence in A2:A7?

alternatives.alternative: No Excel feature can accomplish this; this is possible only using formulas.

questions.question: Q139. Which choice causes a circular error when it is included in a worksheet formula?

alternatives.alternative: a reference to the cell occupied by the formula

questions.question: Q140. You have a workheet with the year in column A, the month in column B, and the day in column C. All fields contain numbers. What function would you use to create the date column in D?
Q141. You have a column containing runner times for a recent race. What function could you use to find the second-place finisher (the runner with the second-lowest time)?
Q142. What is the default horizontal alignment of text in a cell
Q143. Which formula adds 8 and 5 in a cell?

alternatives.alternative: None of these answers, as you cannot add without a SUM function.

questions.question: Q144. What feature allow you to make the text appear as it does in cell B1:F1?
Q145. What type of chart is this?
